channel.title: Spawn Camping
channel.description:
Is rubbish, people are camping at spawn with a sword and waiting for people. I can't go anywhere but my home and when I die they're waiting there, then I get stuck there. It needs to stop, people are staying at spawn with only 1 item, a sword.
AKA Squirt. You're dead by the time the game actually loads.

item.title: Spawn Camping
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

cough Join a pro clan cough

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn Camping
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

ranger squad:

What’s the point of spawn-camping? When they spawn they have nothing on them, where’s the point?

Some people come with stuff they mined when they are transporting friends who don’t know the way to their friends home (e.g. new players) and sometimes have loads of items on them.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn Camping
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

What’s the point of spawn-camping? When they spawn they have nothing on them, where’s the point?

item.title: Spawn Camping
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Squirt Ltd, post:20, topic:377876”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=473761.msg3464095#msg3464095 date=1294770196]
Is rubbish, people are camping at spawn with a sword and waiting for people. I can’t go anywhere but my home and when I die they’re waiting there, then I get stuck there. It needs to stop, people are staying at spawn with only 1 item, a sword.

AKA Squirt. You’re dead by the time the game actually loads.
[/quote]

Only did it once, stop crying. Did you lose anything? No.[/quote]

I’m not crying, I don’t care if I lost anything as I keep everything in my chest. It was more other people you did it too who lost things worth anything.

Read full topic

[/quote]Does that include /spawn?[/quote]

I’m not entirely positive about that.

item.title: Spawn Camping
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:377876”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=473761.msg3464401#msg3464401 date=1294785188]
Also, people are Luring.

e.g

OM MMMM JUST DIED AT HOME LOST MY CRAP!

Someone teles

LOL PWND NUB ME AND MY 6 MAN TEEM GONNA POWN U

That’s happening too.
[/quote]
@Spawn camping, anyone know of a mod that makes the spawn area a safe zone?[/quote]Not exactly, but http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,473805.new.html#new

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn Camping
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:14, topic:377876”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=473761.msg3464401#msg3464401 date=1294785188]
Also, people are Luring.

e.g

OM MMMM JUST DIED AT HOME LOST MY CRAP!

Someone teles

LOL PWND NUB ME AND MY 6 MAN TEEM GONNA POWN U

That’s happening too.
[/quote]

That just seems like your own fault doesn’t it?

@Spawn camping, anyone know of a mod that makes the spawn area a safe zone?[/quote]

It is the persons fault who falls for it, but I still don’t think it should be allowed at spawn. Anywhere else sure. It’s unfair on new players.

Spawn should be safe.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest

Someone teles

That’s happening too.[/quote]

@Lin wrote:

It’s cause the PvP idea wasn’t thought out well.

item.title: Spawn Camping
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:10, topic:377876”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=473761.msg3464248#msg3464248 date=1294777962]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473761.msg3464245#msg3464245 date=1294777894]

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=473761.msg3464234#msg3464234 date=1294777422]

Hmm I thought spawn was a safe area.

Definitely something MITB should look into.

For now I’ll make a temp rule about it:
[b]No PvP within 15 seconds of log in or death respawn, and no PvP within 10 squares of the spawn area. This does not apply to: using /spawn, someone relogging because they were getting attacked, or someone going into the spawn area after the original 10 seconds.

Alright, so if they’re logged for like 10 minutes, type /spawn, i can kill right away? Cuz i sliced up canownyoueasy.
[/quote]That sounds right. Depending on what MITB says, it might change a tad.

I think there should be PVP in a certain area only, and to stop in/out you have to stay in for 10 seconds once you enter

The point is to build cool stuff, not get killed every second
[/quote]I’ve only been in a scary situation once, and that was when I knew people were camping at spawn so I went to attack them. I killed one then tele’d away The key is to build far away
[/quote]Well I teled to spawn and reyx instantly killed me

False. You arrived before I did.[/quote]No, I just got there and I saw you and you killed me

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn Camping
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:9, topic:377876”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473761.msg3464245#msg3464245 date=1294777894]

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=473761.msg3464234#msg3464234 date=1294777422]

Hmm I thought spawn was a safe area.

Definitely something MITB should look into.

For now I’ll make a temp rule about it:
[b]No PvP within 15 seconds of log in or death respawn, and no PvP within 10 squares of the spawn area. This does not apply to: using /spawn, someone relogging because they were getting attacked, or someone going into the spawn area after the original 10 seconds.

Alright, so if they’re logged for like 10 minutes, type /spawn, i can kill right away? Cuz i sliced up canownyoueasy.
[/quote]That sounds right. Depending on what MITB says, it might change a tad.

[quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=473761.msg3464240#msg3464240 date=1294777772]
I think there should be PVP in a certain area only, and to stop in/out you have to stay in for 10 seconds once you enter

The point is to build cool stuff, not get killed every second
[/quote]I’ve only been in a scary situation once, and that was when I knew people were camping at spawn so I went to attack them. I killed one then tele’d away The key is to build far away
[/quote]Well I teled to spawn and reyx instantly killed me[/quote]

False. You arrived before I did.

Read full topic

item.title: Spawn Camping

This is why we need random spawns… It picks a random spot on the generated map and spawns you there ;D

item.title: Spawn Camping
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I Vain I:

Protip: Don’t die.

That’s a bit hard when the game is just finishing loading, imagine for the new players, first login. They’ll be greeted by constant death.

I’m up for the PVP fighting and all, but waiting for people at spawn is a little bit low.

Read full topic
